product_name: UCO Ember LED Flashlight and Lantern - 2013 Overstock
long_description: The perfect addition to your backpack or emergency kit, the Uco Ember LED lantern features a compact design that can be used as a flashlight or for illuminating small spaces. 1-watt LED bulb includes 2 brightness modes plus flashing mode. LED light output: 70 lumens on high and 21 lumens on low. 10 hours run time on High; 20 hours on Low; max beam distance is 2 meters. Ember LED Flashlight and Lantern uses 3 AAA batteries (not included). Overstock.
short_description: The perfect addition to your backpack or emergency kit, the Uco Ember LED lantern features a compact design that can be used as a flashlight or for illuminating small spaces.
